value.title: Silver Lake-Reliance Jio deal: 5 key things you need to know
value.excerpt: The deal comes shortly after Facebook announced investing Rs 43,574 crore in Reliance’s Jio platforms in exchange of 9.99% stake. The deal also covers WhatsApp-JioMart partnership aimed at the smaller retailers in the country.

value.title: Fueling driverless navigation with AI
